long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can now Enjoy a 3-Day Trail period then it is just $1.99 for life.

Velox is a Google Chrome extension that helps users fill in online forms by automatically entering saved data or suggesting entries based on the user's previous inputs. This can be especially useful when completing job applications or registering for websites, as it can save time and ensure that all of the information entered is accurate.

Features:
Auto Form Filling (Beta)
Activate suggestions from saved form data
Export
Import

With Velox, users can easily export and import their saved data, making it easy to transfer information between devices or share it with others. Velox is designed to make it easier and more efficient to complete online forms, and can be a valuable tool for anyone who frequently fills out such forms as part of their job or personal activities.
